general.description: Sanctity is an unusual blend of Sirius and Dvaered cultures, rejecting both the militarism of the Dvaereds and the class structure of the Siriusites, while maintaining deep religious beliefs that permeate throughout Sanctity's culture.
general.bar: The bar is tidy and clean, with most of the visitors be√Øng locals rather than spacefaring pilots, although some foreigners stand out.
